name: Ion exchange resin which is a terpolymer of styrene, divinyl benzene and ethylvinyl benzene, aminomethylated, then quarternized with methyl chloride
FoodContactSubstance: Ion exchange resin which is a terpolymer of styrene, divinyl benzene and ethylvinyl benzene, aminomethylated, then quarternized with methyl chloride (CAS Reg. No. 113114-05-9).
